column4: hey.. how do I remove an item from the menu? for some reason I have two "Services"
want to remove the empty one
Anyone else know? I simply want to remove ONE item from the menu
sorry bud, I'm new to linux too, i could help you if we were talking about menus in IRC.
the menus on the main pannel. I simply want to remove a folder
I think if you click on : applications then >other then menu editor.. that's what you are looking for
thanks lol. I should have seen that
actually I found it myself in the System -> Preference -> Main Menu and I deleted it from there
